description: A zesty, fresh and smooth dessert.
name: Orange Trifle Pots Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 100g milk chocolate, keep 20g and grate into shards

recipeInstructions.text: Prepare the jelly as per pack instructions and allow to cool slightly. Prepare your individual pots or 1 large bowl by layering as below.
Place the sponge fingers at the base and then pour in the the jelly. Allow to set in the fridge for 3 hours.
Heat up a pot to a medium heat and melt 80g of chocolate with the double cream and then remove from the heat to cool. Pour this mixture onto the orange jelly.
Whip the whipping cream to peaks with the orange zest. Now place the orange cream on top of the jelly and garnish with chocolate shards before serving.
